system.description:
You have tapped into truly staggering levels of arcane power, and are able to do things that lesser spellcasters only dream of. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your wizard levels count as sorcerer levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.q162ah61o4pgc1dd]{Metamagic} feature.
  • Half your wizard levels count as sorcerer levels for determining your sorcery points.
  • When you cast a 9th-level spell, you regain sorcery points equal to your Intelligence modifier + your Charisma modifier.
